text: Takheun le gata wahai Muhammad Ulon hai umat cit hamba Allah Lon manusia ban gata meuhat Lagee talihat hana meuubah Teuma bak ulon wahyu Hadharat Neuyue kheun meuhat sidroe-Neuh Allah Ã½ Tuhan gata nyoe cit sidroe meuhat Barangsoe hajat pubuet le bagah Hajat meureumpok deungon Hadharat Peubuet le ligat amal nyang ceudah Tuhanku sidroe bek peucharikat Pubuet ibadat hanya keu Allah MARYAM Ngon nama Allah lon peuphon surat Tuhan Hadharat nyang Maha Murah Tuhanku Sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah
